name: Blend Battles: Epic Battle
description:
Merge the boys and girls on the beach to make them stronger and fight!

In this game, you would need to position the beach boys and girls based on your strategy in the arena and overcome the opponent!

Boys and girls at the same level can be merged to create a bigger and more evolved character - you start with a tiny girl and merge it up to a HUGE woman, same goes for the boys!

Use your brain and skills in this epic merge based fight!
